item.title: Checkov: A Python based Static Code Analysis Tool for Infrastructure-As-Code
item.description:
Description

This talk was presented at PyBay2021 Food Truck Edition - 6th annual Bay Area Regional Python conference. See pybay.com for more details about PyBay and click SHOW MORE for more information about this talk.

DESCRIPTION Infrastructure-As-Code is an industry "best practice", but we should be verifying what is being developed. If you run CI/CD pipelines for deployment make sure to define you infrastructure and put policies in place from a security perspective.

ABOUT THE SPEAKER Software Engineer, Google Developer Expert, Apache Beam Committer.
